creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: profile of very muscular nude man who is seated supporting his elbow on his knee, and his chin on his hand
marks:
Signature

in graphite on recto at lower right:  signed in plate, lower left: [J.-B. Carpeaux inv.]
medium: Etching in brown ink on thin Japan
provenance: [C. & J. Goodfriend, New York, until December 8, 1993; sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Ugolino
